Plot: An ex-office worker becomes a ventriloquist, leading to a date with his unemployment counselor; but his quirky family and a gauche female friend may thwart his new career and love life.
Title: Dummy
Actors: Adrien Brody, Milla Jovovich, Illeana Douglas, Vera Farmiga
tomatoConsensus: Dummy is a sweet family comedy that succeeds due to charming performances, even if the final product feels slightly undercooked.
